lyrics:
3 contributorsrevenge lyricsverse 1
by now you should know everything you say
can and will be used against you someday
i got the microphone so dont go too far
cause im gonna tell the whole world how you really are

i dont even care how youre gonna feel
cause ive already tried to give you something real
so go ahead and get mad never talk to me again
i dont even care cause i got my revenge

chorus
revenge
revenge
got my revenge

refrain
one night youre begging me to stay
the next night you push me away
i dont need your promise i give it up
its too late cause now im giving up

chorus
revenge
revenge
got my revenge
you might also likeverse 2
by now you should know everything you say
can and will be used against you someday
ive got the microphone so dont go too far
cause im gonna tell the whole world how you really are
so go ahead and get mad never talk to me again
i dont even care cause i got my revenge

revenge
got my revenge
revenge
revenge
revenge
